name: Speed Typer
intro: A website for checking spelling and practice typing.

details.p1: When user clicks the start button the system will start..
details.p2: The user will be provided a sentence. The sentence is changeable.
details.p3: Mistaken spelling, punctuation, blank space will be underlined with error effect.
details.p4: User have to type within the given time duration.
